description: This file implements the core functions for a System Repository Driver, allowing addition, deletion, retrieval, and modification of folders and records within a repository hierarchy. It provides object management through handles, path parsing, permission checks, and recursive folder navigation.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysRdoAddFolder1(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pFolderName,ULONG ulPermission,ULONG ulFolderType,ANSC_HANDLE hRenderAttr,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Adds a new folder to the root directory using specified parameters.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysRdoAddFolder2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName,ULONG ulPermission,ULONG ulFolderType,ANSC_HANDLE hRenderAttr,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Creates a subfolder under a specified current folder, parsing a path string and creating intermediate folders as needed.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysRdoDelFolder1(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pFolderName,BOOL bRecursive,BOOL bForceful)
methods.description: Deletes a folder from the root directory, potentially recursively and forcefully.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysRdoDelFolder2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName,BOOL bRecursive,BOOL bForceful)
methods.description: Deletes a specified subfolder, handling recursive and forceful deletion.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysRdoGetFolder1(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pFolderName)
methods.description: Retrieves a folder handle by matching folder name at the root level.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysRdoGetFolder2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName)
methods.description: Retrieves a subfolder handle by path, parsing the path string.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysRdoAddRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pRecordName,ULONG ulPermission,ULONG ulRecordType,ANSC_HANDLE hRenderAttr,PVOID pBuffer,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Adds a new record under the specified folder, parsing the path and checking permissions.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysRdoDelRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pRecordName)
methods.description: Deletes a record identified by its path, ensuring correct permissions.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysRdoGetRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pRecordName)
methods.description: Retrieves a record handle by its path, navigating folder hierarchy.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysRdoSetRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pRecordName,ULONG ulRecordType,ANSC_HANDLE hRenderAttr,PVOID pBuffer,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Modifies an existing record identified by its path, updating its data and attributes.

ctags.name: SysRdoAddFolder1
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pFolderName,ULONG ulPermission,ULONG ulFolderType,ANSC_HANDLE hRenderAttr,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)

ctags.name: SysRdoAddFolder2
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName,ULONG ulPermission,ULONG ulFolderType,ANSC_HANDLE hRenderAttr,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)

ctags.name: SysRdoAddRecord
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pRecordName,ULONG ulPermission,ULONG ulRecordType,ANSC_HANDLE hRenderAttr,PVOID pBuffer,ULONG ulSize)

ctags.name: SysRdoSetRecord
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pRecordName,ULONG ulRecordType,ANSC_HANDLE hRenderAttr,PVOID pBuffer,ULONG ulSize)
